early.description: Born in a city under constant siege, you grew up to the sounds of distant gunfire and explosions.
At age five, you lost a family member during a bombing raid, teaching you the harsh realities of war.
You learned to navigate the ruins of your neighborhood, developing a keen sense of awareness and survival instincts.
Food shortages forced you to scavenge in dangerous areas, strengthening your resolve and physical endurance.
Witnessing acts of both cruelty and kindness, you began to understand the complexities of human nature.
You formed a close-knit group with other survivors, learning the importance of trust and cooperation.
An illness swept through your community; you survived while others did not, leaving you with survivor's guilt.
You witnessed a ceasefire being broken, shattering your faith in authorities and peace talks.
A brief period of normalcy allowed you to attend a makeshift school, igniting a thirst for knowledge despite limited opportunities.
You developed a strong bond with a pet or animal companion, providing comfort amidst chaos.
An encounter with unexploded ordnance taught you caution and the importance of careful observation.
You saved a younger child from danger, earning respect and a sense of responsibility.
A makeshift shelter you built protected your family during a sudden attack, showcasing your ingenuity.
You found a hidden stash of supplies but chose to share it with others rather than keep it for yourself.
Witnessing acts of bravery inspired you to remain hopeful despite the surrounding despair.
You suffered a minor injury that left a scar, a constant reminder of the dangers you face daily.
An elderly survivor taught you valuable life skills, passing on wisdom that guides you.

mid.description: You joined a community defense group, learning basic combat skills and tactics.
A betrayal by someone you trusted hardened your outlook, making you more cautious and self-reliant.
You negotiated a truce between feuding survivor groups, demonstrating leadership and diplomacy.
An ambush forced you to flee your home, adapting quickly to new surroundings.
You discovered a safe passage through a war-torn area, aiding others in escaping danger.
Captured by hostile forces, you endured interrogation without revealing vital information.
You led a group of survivors to a secure location, earning their trust and reliance.
An injury left you temporarily impaired; overcoming this obstacle strengthened your determination.
You found a hidden cache of pre-war books, deepening your understanding of the world before the conflict.
Witnessing an atrocity committed by corporate forces, you became disillusioned with any notion of their benevolence.
You assisted in setting up a communication network among survivors, improving coordination and safety.
A close friend was recruited by a militant group; their departure left you questioning your own path.
You developed a chronic condition due to environmental hazards, adapting your lifestyle to manage it.
An encounter with a corporate mercenary revealed that not all enemies are what they seem.
You created a system for rationing scarce resources, preventing conflict within your group.
A natural disaster compounded the existing chaos, testing your survival skills further.
You began mentoring younger survivors, passing on hard-earned knowledge.

late.description: You became a leader among survivors, organizing efforts to rebuild and protect your community.
An opportunity to evacuate the conflict zone arose, forcing you to choose between leaving or staying to help others.
You negotiated a temporary ceasefire between warring factions, bringing a brief respite to the chaos.
A betrayal within your ranks threatened everything you had worked for, challenging your trust in others.
You uncovered evidence of corporate exploitation fueling the conflict, fueling your desire for justice.
A personal loss reignited old wounds, but also strengthened your resolve to make a difference.
You led a daring mission to rescue trapped civilians, risking your life for others.
An injury left you with lasting effects, but you adapted and continued to contribute meaningfully.
You brokered a deal for essential supplies, navigating complex politics and moral dilemmas.
Faced with overwhelming odds, you inspired others to stand firm, becoming a symbol of resilience.
You discovered a hidden talent, such as medicine or engineering, which greatly benefited your community.
An external force offered aid with hidden agendas; you had to discern their true intentions.
You were offered a position within a powerful faction, forcing you to choose between personal gain and communal loyalty.
A vision or dream guided you toward a new purpose, altering your path and priorities.
You began documenting the stories of survivors, preserving history amidst the destruction.
Facing the root causes of the conflict, you decided to take action to address them directly.
You organized an underground network to help others escape or survive, risking exposure and retaliation.
